title: Lycanthrope

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: - Pick a player, if they are good, you astrally redirect the factional kill to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Can only spawn if the evil faction has a factional kill/attacker.
- If the factional kill would target you, your ability fails and you always die.
- Susceptible to frames.

desc:
Post 3911
*"Beneath the thin veneer of civilisation lies a howling madness."*
